languages.text: Для {mf|того|той}, кто обратил{mf||ла} в бегство тварей из шахт Веабоса-6, любое столкновение с ксеносами — желанная проверка способностей.
For {mf|him|her} who made the monstrosities from the mines of Vheabos VI turn and flee, any clash with xenos is a welcome test of skill and prowess.
languages.original_text: Для {mf|того|той}, кто обратил{mf||ла} в бегство тварей из шахт Веабоса-6, любое столкновение с ксеносами — желанная проверка способностей.

traits.locale_text: For {mf|him|her} who made the monstrosities from the mines of Vheabos VI turn and flee, any clash with xenos is a welcome test of skill and prowess.
For {mf|him|her} who made the monstrosities from the mines of Vheabos VI turn and flee, any clash with xenos is a welcome test of skill and prowess.
For {mf|him|her} who made the monstrosities from the mines of Vheabos VI turn and flee, any clash with xenos is a welcome test of skill and prowess.
For {mf|him|her} who made the monstrosities from the mines of Vheabos VI turn and flee, any clash with xenos is a welcome test of skill and prowess.

languages.text: Für {mf|ihn, der|sie, die} die Monstrositäten aus den Minen von Vheabos-VI in die Flucht schlug, ist jede Auseinandersetzung mit Xenos eine willkommene Prüfung {mf|seines|ihres} Geschicks und Heldenmuts.
languages.original_text: For {mf|him|her} who made the monstrosities from the mines of Vheabos VI turn and flee, any clash with xenos is a welcome test of skill and prowess.

traits.locale_text: Für {mf|ihn, der|sie, die} die Monstrositäten aus den Minen von Vheabos-VI in die Flucht schlug, ist jede Auseinandersetzung mit Xenos eine willkommene Prüfung {mf|seines|ihres} Geschicks und Heldenmuts.

languages.text: Vheabos VI madenlerindeki hilkat garibelerini kaçmaya mecbur bırakan için zenolarla her türlü çatışma, hoş birer yetenek ve hüner testidir.
languages.original_text: For {mf|him|her} who made the monstrosities from the mines of Vheabos VI turn and flee, any clash with xenos is a welcome test of skill and prowess.

traits.locale_text: Vheabos VI madenlerindeki hilkat garibelerini kaçmaya mecbur bırakan için zenolarla her türlü çatışma, hoş birer yetenek ve hüner testidir.

languages.text: Para {mf|el|la} artífice de la desbandada de las monstruosidades que infestaban las minas de Vheabos VI, todo enfrentamiento con xenos supone una oportunidad para poner a prueba su habilidad.
languages.original_text: For {mf|him|her} who made the monstrosities from the mines of Vheabos VI turn and flee, any clash with xenos is a welcome test of skill and prowess.

traits.locale_text: Para {mf|el|la} artífice de la desbandada de las monstruosidades que infestaban las minas de Vheabos VI, todo enfrentamiento con xenos supone una oportunidad para poner a prueba su habilidad.

languages.text: 在伟大的行商浪人面前，维博斯六号星的怪物四散奔逃。对{mf|他|她}而言，与异形的每次交锋，都是勇气与技艺的考验。
languages.original_text: For {mf|him|her} who made the monstrosities from the mines of Vheabos VI turn and flee, any clash with xenos is a welcome test of skill and prowess.

traits.locale_text: 在伟大的行商浪人面前，维博斯六号星的怪物四散奔逃。对{mf|他|她}而言，与异形的每次交锋，都是勇气与技艺的考验。

languages.text: Pour {mf|celui|celle} qui a poussé les monstruosités issues des mines de Vhéabos-VI à prendre la fuite, chaque affrontement avec des xénos est une occasion parfaite de prouver ses compétences.
languages.original_text: For {mf|him|her} who made the monstrosities from the mines of Vheabos VI turn and flee, any clash with xenos is a welcome test of skill and prowess.

traits.locale_text: Pour {mf|celui|celle} qui a poussé les monstruosités issues des mines de Vhéabos-VI à prendre la fuite, chaque affrontement avec des xénos est une occasion parfaite de prouver ses compétences.

languages.text: ヴェアボスVIの鉱山から湧いて出た化け物どもに尻尾を巻かせて逃げ出させた{mf|him|her}にとっては、異種相手の小競り合いなんざ、ちょうどいい腕試しだ。
languages.original_text: For {mf|him|her} who made the monstrosities from the mines of Vheabos VI turn and flee, any clash with xenos is a welcome test of skill and prowess.

traits.locale_text: ヴェアボスVIの鉱山から湧いて出た化け物どもに尻尾を巻かせて逃げ出させた{mf|him|her}にとっては、異種相手の小競り合いなんざ、ちょうどいい腕試しだ。
